name: Chief Monitoring Officer
description: Template for Chief Monitoring Officers focusing on risk oversight, compliance monitoring, audit management, and control effectiveness.

capturePrompts.label: Monitoring Area
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Operational risk, Compliance, Financial controls, Cybersecurity

capturePrompts.label: Finding / Alert
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Control weakness, Threshold breach, Anomaly detected

capturePrompts.label: Severity Rating
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Critical, High, Medium, Low, Informational

capturePrompts.label: Root Cause
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Process gap, System failure, Human error, External factor

capturePrompts.label: Remediation / Escalation
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Escalate to board, Implement control, Conduct investigation

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Chief Monitoring Officer. Focus on risk identification, control effectiveness, and proactive issue detection. Prioritize findings by severity and potential impact. Ensure appropriate escalation and documentation. Maintain independence and objectivity in assessments.
